channel.title: SKIpkpker help?
channel.description: Ok so i ip banded SKIpkpker but he still manages to get on. It says, failed to logon SKIpkpker because his ip is banded, but he still gets on some how. How do i stop him?

item.title: SKIpkpker help?
item.dc:creator: @MrMoney MrMoney
item.description:
@MrMoney wrote:

[quote=“zoltanman, post:5, topic:190720”][quote author=MrMoney link=topic=254247.msg2119789#msg2119789 date=1205914564]
Lol, you are a noob…
It is a program anyone can download it.
It uses a proxy so you can’t ip ban it.
You have to block invalid packets is the easiest way to block it.
If you don’t know what packets are you should GFTO.
[/quote]

Don’t post in the development/help section anymore, thanks.

It doesn’t use a proxy, it’s just used by a wide variety of people.

There’s only one real solution, it’s to make sure your server checks for a full login procedure.[/quote]
I could’ve sworn it used a proxy or ip hider…
Oh well guess i was wrong.
My server automatically checks for full login procedure

Read full topic

item.title: SKIpkpker help?
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

[quote=“MrMoney, post:2, topic:190720”]Lol, you are a noob…
It is a program anyone can download it.
It uses a proxy so you can’t ip ban it.
You have to block invalid packets is the easiest way to block it.
If you don’t know what packets are you should GFTO.[/quote]

Don’t post in the development/help section anymore, thanks.

It doesn’t use a proxy, it’s just used by a wide variety of people.

There’s only one real solution, it’s to make sure your server checks for a full login procedure.

Read full topic

The only way to block the new one is to block invalid packets
